availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Dabney Shackelford (McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky, native. Married to Amelia O. Jenkins Shackelford in Nelson County, Kentucky, on October 10, 1831. Father of Susan E. Shackelford, Edward T. Shackelford, James A. Shackelford, Virginia Shackelford, Robert Nall Shackelford, Georgia A. Shackelford, and Sarah G. Shackelford. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in McLean County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 156.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 430B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #007724554, Nelson County Marriages, p. 5.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #2090.
"James Dabney Shackelford (1808-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial #85751502, accessed April 25, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85751502.
